resources.string:
Please note this program requires root access on a phone with a working serial connection to the printer.

 Serial Port API v1.1
 \ More information and bug report on [http://code.google.com/p/android-serialport-api]
 
 Copyright 2010,2011 Cedric Priscal
Please configure your serial port first.
You do not have read/write permission to the serial port.
The serial port can not be opened for an unknown reason.
